name: craigslist redesign challenge
description:
CHALLENGE

Redesign craigslist home page


Brief 1 — Limitations

The website is successful and the owners are reluctant to make drastic design changes


Can you make small changes that can make a big impact? Think of the effort and impact if this were to be developed.


Some ideas on what to change

  • Layout
  • Grid
  • Spacing
  • Colors
  • Font size


Brief 2 — Go Rogue

Go wild and make big changes


Get started

  1. Duplicate file
  2. Have fun
  3. Share with community
  4. Share with me on twitter @royquilor happy to give feedback


Why do this?

I want to practise making small changes and to improve my visual design


Need a tutorial?

If you would like to learn along or see how I would make simple changes when I release this video, follow my channel on youtube/c/awwesome

Or find me on twitter @royquilor
